parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Roads and Airports </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the side of an airport, set by [[setAirportSide]]. Default side is [[sideUnknown]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> See [[Arma: Airport IDs]] for a list of airport ids.</value></part></template>
</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value> When used on a non-existent airport id:
* negative numbers will always return [[sideUnknown]]
* positive numbers may return [[east]], [[west]], [[resistance]], [[sideEmpty]], [[sideUnknown]], [[sideAmbientLife]], or 'ERROR' (see [[#Notes|Notes]]). </value></part><part><name>PROBLEMS</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[airportSide]] id </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> id: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[airportSide]] target <template><title>since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> target: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _airportSide = [[airportSide]] 0;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma: Airport IDs]], [[setAirportSide]], [[land]], [[landAt]], [[assignToAirport]], [[allAirports]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 12, 2020 23:01 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
